claim: Laurence Olivier starred in the 1948 adaptation of King Lear.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His television appearances included an adaptation of The Moon and Sixpence  (  1960  )  , Long Day 's Journey into Night  (  1973  )  , Love Among the Ruins  (  1975  )  , Cat on a Hot Tin Roof  (  1976  )  , Brideshead Revisited  (  1981  )  and King Lear  (  1983  )  .
